settings.text:
Welcome to Settlemyre Nursery, where you can find the perfect gift for any occasion with our Settlemyre Nursery Gift Card. Whether you're celebrating a birthday, anniversary, or simply want to show someone you care, our gift card is the ideal choice.

Why choose a Settlemyre Nursery Gift Card? Here are a few reasons:

  • Versatility: Our gift card can be used to purchase any item in our store, giving the recipient the freedom to choose what they truly desire.
  • Quality: Settlemyre Nursery is known for its commitment to providing high-quality, timeless products. By giving a gift card, you're ensuring that your loved ones can experience the same level of quality and craftsmanship that we are renowned for.
  • Sustainability: With our focus on sustainability, our gift card aligns with our values. By allowing the recipient to choose their own eco-friendly product, you're contributing to a greener future.
  • Convenience: Our gift card can be easily purchased online and delivered directly to the recipient's email inbox, making it a convenient option for last-minute gifts or when distance separates you.

How to use the Settlemyre Nursery Gift Card:

  1. Visit our website and browse our collection of beautiful plants, shrubs, trees and more
  2. Select the desired item(s) and add them to the shopping cart.
  3. During the checkout process, enter the unique gift card code provided in the email.
  4. The value of the gift card will be applied to the total amount due.
  5. Complete the purchase and await the arrival of your chosen item(s) at your doorstep.

Gift cards are valid for one year from the date of purchase and can only be redeemed on our website or in-store at the Garden Center. Please note that gift cards cannot be exchanged for cash or refunded.

Surprise your loved ones with the gift of choice and let them discover the timeless and eco-friendly products that Settlemyre Nursery has to offer. Purchase a Settlemyre Nursery Gift Card today!
